content: this is a very feminine crochet sweater pattern that is fun to crochet it comes in sizes s m l xl xxl and xxxl it is very beginner friendly and looks beautiful in all seasons this pattern is very beginner friendly and can be crocheted with any aran weight 4 yarn of your choice i used lion brand feels like butta yarn in shade mint as well as a 5 mm crochet hook my step by step crochet pattern is easy to follow and contains plenty of photographs and descriptions on how to assemble the sweater my pdf pattern is 15 pages long this is an easy crochet pattern for a sweater/jumper made following the simple filet crochet technique my video tutorial for this project is linked in the pattern pattern will be available for instant download upon purchase this pattern is written in us terms british terms in brackets for extra help you can contact me by message happy crochet and thank you for stopping by
